title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Mathematical Competencies for Vocational Professionals Using Contextualized Instructional Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental math concepts and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners apply context-specific mathematical problem-solving strategies (medical statistics, technical calculations, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Learners connect mathematical concepts to real-world work scenarios with over 90% engagement through situational tasks in mobile environments
Learners demonstrate a 20% improvement in mathematical application skills compared to baseline assessments through summative evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
